channel.title: General Chicago Christmas Flickr Hiromi Rails Upgrading Api Nye Killhannah on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Chicago Christmas Flickr Hiromi Rails Upgrading Api Nye Killhannah on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: this is a long awaited post
item.description: I am lost in regards to what to listen to. I need something new. Or old. i don’t know. This is really amazing. For some reason people are taking “famous” videos and making them “stable.” It is quite interesting and makes watching the videos a bit more mysterious - cuz the video becomes much more clear and… stable. hah. Christmas was cool. Hiromi came over from tokyo around the 19th. We hung out with a bunch of people.
